Header: New Director General Financial Management Assumes Duties
Content: Major General C.K Handunmulla assumed office as the 10th Director General Financial Management Branch of the Army on Tuesday (10) at the Army Headquarters. The newly-appointed Director General signed an official document to that effect amid religious observances. He succeeded Major General Duminda Sirinaga who was recently appointed as the Quarter Master General at the Army Headquarters. Staff Officers and several Other Ranks at the Branch were present during the occasion.
